rationale: Encrypting the IaaS VM's OS disk (boot volume) ensures that its entire content is fully unrecoverable without a key and thus protects the volume from unwarranted reads.
recommended_action:
Follow Microsoft Azure's documentation for IaaS Disk Encryption.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security/azure-security-disk-encryption-overview
error_message: Disk's encryption settings collection is not enabled
ruleNames: Ensure that OS disk is encrypted
